title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 75 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 75 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
lineList.cn: （亚萨的诗歌，交与伶长，调用休要毁坏）神阿，我们称谢你，我们称谢你，因为你的名相近，人都述说你奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
lineList.cn: 我到了所定的日期，必按正直施行审判。

lineList.en: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.
lineList.cn: 地和其上的居民，都消化了。我曾立了地的柱子。（细拉）

lineList.en: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
lineList.cn: 我对狂傲人说，不要行事狂傲。对凶恶的人说，不要举角。

lineList.en: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.
lineList.cn: 不要把你们的角高举。不要挺着颈项说话。

lineList.en: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
lineList.cn: 因为高举非从东，非从西，也非从南而来。

lineList.en: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.
lineList.cn: 惟有神断定。他使这人降卑，使那人升高。

lineList.en: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.
lineList.cn: 耶和华手里有杯。其中的酒起沫。杯内满了搀杂的酒。他倒出来。地上的恶人必都喝这酒的渣滓，而且喝尽。

lineList.en: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
lineList.cn: 但我要宣扬，直到永远。我要歌颂雅各的神。

lineList.en: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
lineList.cn: 恶人一切的角，我要砍断。惟有义人的角，必被高举。
